meanings.definition: A plant with prickly heads used for teasing or raising the nap on cloth.
meanings.sent1: The teasel plant has spiky heads that help in raising the nap on cloth.
meanings.sent2: I saw a teasel plant in the garden, its prickly heads catching my attention.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used a teasel plant to playfully tease the fabric.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted like a teasel, gently raising the nap of memories long forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The teasel plant stood tall, its prickly heads ready to work on the cloth.

meanings.definition: To comb or card wool with a teasel.
meanings.sent1: She would teasel the wool carefully, ensuring it was smooth and soft.
meanings.sent2: Teaseling the wool made it easier to spin into yarn.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to teasel the yarn ball, thinking it was a fun game.
meanings.sent4: His laughter teaseling through the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The gentle motion of teaseling the wool was oddly satisfying.

meanings.definition: A tool with a row of pointed metal teeth used for raising the nap on cloth.
meanings.sent1: The teasel tool had sharp metal teeth for raising the nap on fabric.
meanings.sent2: She used the teasel tool to carefully work on the delicate cloth.
meanings.sent3: The teasel tool looked like a tiny comb for fabric, with its metal teeth.
meanings.sent4: The teasel tool worked like magic, bringing life back to the worn-out fabric.
meanings.sent5: With the teasel tool in hand, she skillfully restored the fabric to its former glory.
